about.title: About Word & Wonder
about.subtitle: Your Partner in Academic Excellence
about.description: With over 8 years of experience in UK education, I specialise in helping students excel in their GCSEs, A-Levels, and university applications. My approach combines proven teaching methods with personalised attention to each student's unique learning style.
qualifications: Level 3 Award in Education and Training

services.title: GCSE & A-Level Preparation
services.description: Comprehensive support for English Literature and Language GCSEs and A-Levels with exam-focused strategies.

services.title: University Application Support
services.description: Expert guidance through UCAS applications, personal statements, and interview preparation.

services.title: 11+ & 13+ Preparation
services.description: Specialized coaching for independent school entrance examinations with proven success rates.

testimonials.title: Student Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from real students across the UK

reviews.name: Sarah Matthews
reviews.content: Thanks to the expert tutoring, I improved my English Literature grade from a C to an A*. The personalized approach really made the difference!

reviews.name: James Thompson
reviews.content: The 11+ preparation was fantastic. My son gained confidence and achieved the scores needed for his dream school. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Emma Wilson
reviews.content: The personal statement guidance was invaluable. I received offers from all five universities I applied to, including my first choice!
